title: Sunday Morning Half Marathon
description:
Gorgeous sunrise run through the Nottinghamshire countryside. Perfect conditions for a PB attempt!

âœ¨ AI Summary:
What a run! This half marathon through the rolling Nottinghamshire countryside was a masterclass in pacing, with negative splits from start to finish. Your heart rate stayed beautifully controlled through the first 10K before unleashing in the final third. The elevation gains were handled with textbook form and your cadence stayed remarkably consistent. A seriously impressive performance.
